sentences.en: And presto, the function can finally return with 6 - which is indeed 3!
sentences.cn: 随之函数最终得到返回值6即3!

sentences.en: I just turned the piece of wire in the lock and hey presto, the door opened.
sentences.cn: 我把金属丝伸到锁孔里一拧,嘿, 那门就开了.
快! 滚蛋! 不要再到这儿来 —— 斯威夫特.

sentences.en: Put it on the Units you wish to teleport and then click near the Mastermind Presto.
sentences.cn: 把它放在您要传送得单位上然后单击摄魂师附近,就可以了.

sentences.en: Quick makeup, hair and outfit and PRESTO!
sentences.cn: 快速化妆 、 做发型、换装,搞定!

sentences.en: Quick makeup, hair, and outfit changes, and PRESTO!
sentences.cn: 快速化妆 、 做发型 、 换装, 极速的快板!

sentences.en: Summon them right where you think the Stealth unit and presto!
sentences.cn: 把他们直接召唤到你认为有隐形单位的地方.

sentences.en: Symphony No.3 in C minor , Op . 78 , Organ : Presto.
sentences.cn: 小调第三“管风琴”协奏曲, 作品 78—— 急板乐章.

sentences.en: There is always an element of presto chango in international relations.
sentences.cn: 国际关系总是存在着突变的因素.

sentences.en: When the stove is turns off , the pan drops and a presto electromagnetic bacon eggs!
sentences.cn: 炉底的磁圈能使菜锅变热.

sentences.en: With something so important, you can't just wave a wand and presto!
sentences.cn: 在这么重大的问题上, 你想挥动一下指挥棒,转眼就变过来,办不到!

sentences.en: You just press the button and, hey presto, a perfect cup of coffee!
sentences.cn: 只要按下按钮，嘿，马上就出来一杯上好的咖啡！

sentences.en: You just press the button and, hey presto, a perfect cup of coffee!
sentences.cn: 只需按下按钮, 嘿, 一杯可口的咖啡就出来了!

trans.tran_cn: 说变就变（表示完成某事如变戏法般迅速容易）

trans.tran_en: a piece of music, or part of one, that is played or sung very quickly
